page.title: 13LIVING ON A FARM
page.content:
My Dad is a farmer at High Mickley on the South side of the village. He has cows and calves and sheep and lambs. He grows corn and barley. As well as being a farmer he builds trailers to sell. My Mum and I are interested in Roman history and are going to dig at the Roman camp at Vindolanda in the school holidays. It is nice living in the country. {Nicola Ridley Age 9
My Dad is a farmer. He has to know a lot about machines because he has to look after the tractors and the combine harvester. I go to Mickley School on a special bus. {Tony Ridley Age 7
